specifications.Dye Method: Cation Dye Cation-dyed fabrics feature a unique heather effect that varies based on the ratio of cation-dyeable polyester fibers. When applied to cotton blends, the dye only colors the surface, resulting in a natural fading and vintage appearance. Due to this process, color variations may occur between production lots, and the yardage may differ slightly from the provided swatches.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use T-shirts, Activewear
